Luneblaze assessment test is comprehensive assessment of a candidate\'s Soft skills, Aptitude and Domain knowledge. On the basis of this test, individual scores in each category will be provided to the candidate in an Assessment report. On the basis of the test score, candidates will be referred for interviews for hiring purposes at various companies. To the start the assessment process a candidate has to pay the assessment fee. This fee is non-refundable. Luneblaze will notify the candidate about the assessment process after the payment is made. Taking the assessment test does not guarantee job placement. By clicking I agree you agree to the above terms.
